title: Nalia and the Potion Maker
description: Memory thieves. Potions. Unrequited love. A villain with a tragic childhood. Long lost love. Betrayal and redemption.It's a world Nalia can't even conceive of, but one she will soon find out is very real and desperate to get her back. She is the bearer of one of its most coveted and sacred gifts, a gift that has killed many and forced others into hiding.When an unusual visitor escapes from this world to find her, he gives her a near impossible to help find the once great potion maker whose memory has been stolen––if he’s even still alive.There, Nalia meets the strong yet gentle Lyris who can heal anything with his touch. She'll discover that his powers run deep as he slowly begins to mend the pieces of her heart, shattered by her own tragic family and a haunting secret––one stemming before she was even born.
author: Queenbe Monyei
